attributes.action: Let children who live outside the area to get in to public schools in the area
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many children who live outside a given area are declined a place in schools. Children should be treated fairly, and therefore should be allowed in without judging them on where they live. If the child is safely able to get to the school, they should be allowed to go to school there.
